Title: Search for flights
Steps: Open flight booking system | Enter source | Enter destination | Select date | Click search
Expected: Available flights are displayed with prices and seat classes

Title: Select a flight
Steps: Search for flights | Choose a flight from the list | Select seat class | Click book

Title: Select a seat
Steps: Choose a flight | Select a seat from the available options | Click continue

Title: Process payment
Steps: Enter payment details | Select payment method | Click pay

Title: Handle payment failure
Steps: Enter invalid payment details | Click pay
Expected: Error message is displayed and option to retry is available

Title: Receive booking confirmation
Steps: Complete payment successfully | Check email inbox

Title: Check flight details in booking
Steps: Complete booking | Go to booking history | Select the recent booking

Title: Search with no available flights
Steps: Open flight booking system | Enter source | Enter destination | Select date with no flights | Click search
Expected: No flights available message is displayed
